attributes.action: stop overseas recruitment to the public sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Especially from Asia - hasn't it occurred to anyone this might be a security risk ?

If the British govt is going to expect British subjects to work alongside less qualified staff, please can you :

1. Improve their language skills
2. Orientate them better about the Sex Discrimination and Dignity At Work Acts 3. Pay everyone the same or at last make increments comprehensible and comprehensive
4. Supervise them properly

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
